name: Magic Of The Woods
description:
press 'E' to choose a spell, when you get to level 2 you get the 3rd spell.

press 'enter' to put in cheats (only i know the cheat codes).

kill the rats.

Credits - HeartBeast / uHeartBeast made a lot of the art.

LucasRAB / Me - i made the rest by following his tutorials
